item.title: Ron Howard Planned ‘Happy Days’ Exit If Title Got Changed to ‘Fonzie’s Happy Days’: ‘My Ego Wouldn’t Allow for That. I Wasn’t Bluffing. I Would’ve Left’
item.description: Ron Howard revealed in a career-spanning Vulture interview that he was ready to walk away from “Happy Days” if the team behind the beloved ABC sitcom changed its title to “Fonzie&#82
